name: Slippery Slides
summary:
The race is on, and it's a slippery slope!

You know how they say nice guys finish last? Well, don't be a nice guy!

Start each level last and finish 1st!
Swerve around, bang into, or block the other sliders - whatever you gotta do to win.
Don't let them pass!
Slide over boosters and ramps for extra speed and jumps.

Show those lemons you're Number 1!
